name: Shadow of the Serpent Lord
description:
"Shadow of the Serpent Lord"

(c) 2023 Alexander Kazazis

This was the day Shuloran the Brave was supposed to be married to Erishinda the Fair. Instead, he woke up with the head of a crocodile and was cast out by the King! Now he must fight through the Temple of Gargameshna, placate the Lord of Serpents, and find his way back to his betrothed.

AD/Arrows: Move

Space: Jump

S/Down Arrow: Crouch

P: Pause

M: Map

Space/1/2: Dialog Controls

Unlockable Abilities:

Left Click/ Left Ctrl: Sword

Left Shift: Dash

Space while airborne: Double Jump

Right Click/ Left Alt/ F: Fireball

Design, Art, Writing, Code by Alexander Kazazis

https://fallingwallgames.itch.io

Contains music (c) 2020 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)

Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

Also contains music by Tony Longworth

https://tonylongworth.bandcamp.com/

Color palette based on the NES (with additions)

Created in 1 month for the Metroidvania Month 19 game jam

https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-19

Theme: You Are the Monster

Font: Alagard by Hewett Tsoi
